long_description: Simplistic texturepack for ctf based on WINNI's miner16px made for visibility , performance and good looks. For any suggestions please message me ingame on the capture the flag (classes)  server , on my discord (riptiderazor#2576) or comment on the pack in the comments in cdb. My first texturepack :)
